sense.def:
Stuff
je kakršnakoli snov ali skupina predmetov.

seg.quote: What's that stuff in the bucket?
Quite a lot of stuff had been stolen.
She was reading the travel stuff in the colour supplement.

sense.def:
To stuff something somewhere
pomeni nekaj hitro in grobo potisniti nekam.

seg.quote: Willie gathered up the bills and stuffed them carelessly into his pocket.

sense.def:
Kadar prostor ali posoda
is stuffed with things
, je polna stvari.

seg.quote: The cupboard was stuffed with old fishing tackle.
He'd got a big rucksack, stuffed with notes, on his back.

gramGrp.pos:
REFL VB
or
VB
with
OBJ

sense.def:
To stuff oneself
pomeni pojesti veliko hrane;

seg.quote: Karin was stuffing herself with eggs and toast.
I was stuffing my face with ice-cream.

sense.def:
To stuff a bird or a vegetable
pomeni naložiti v perutnino ali zelenjavo mešano hrano, preden jo damo kuhat.

To stuff a dead animal
pomeni napolniti mrtvo žival z različnim materialom, da se ohrani in jo je možno razstaviti.
